name: Slime Slayer (itch) (VictorStorm)
description:
This game was a final of Vocational Training of Development of Multimedia Apps. In this case, I did this game with Java with a partner. The entire project was develop on Eclipse (Java workspace). The graphics were done on Gimp and Pixilart. The music and the sound effects were selected on freesound.

The game is a kind of survival 2D with vibes of arcade games with the score section, power ups and THE TANK CONTROLS. The objective is survive the most wave you can with the best score.

NOTE: You will need to have Java on your SO to exectue the game. Also on the folder that is placed, after a game will create a new file that saves the scores.
